description.narrative: The IFC advisory services program and accompanying investment in SBM is expected to deliver a measurable economic (financial) and sustainable (non-financial) development impact by: 1. Funding through SBM, those investments in IFC target areas that are often short of medium-term hard currency funding such as Infrastructure (including sustainable, renewable clean energy), Education, Healthcare, and Agri-business; and 2. Increasing access to finance for SMEs through a proven approach to capacity building and introducing SME credit rating review by linking in the IFC MSME business methodology.

The project is a joint advisory and investment package. IFC will provide advisory services in the form of the Business Edge Program designed to identify and upgrade the skill set of the client banks Small and Medium Enterprise (SME) loan officers, credit officers, and SME Clients indentified by the bank. IFC will also invest in the form of a senior loan to provide foreign currency needed by the bank to meet its medium term funding plans and local / regional obligations.
